Question: This person believed a spherical static universe is philosophically preferred, because it would obey Mach's principle.
Hints: This person collaborated with others to produce a model of a wormhole.
This person and De Haas demonstrated that magnetization is due to the motion of electrons, nowadays known to be the spin.
This person was born in Ulm, in the Kingdom of Württemberg in the German Empire on 14 March 1879.
